description:
Cookies for breakfast, and not just on cheat days. With the satisfyingly crunchy chew of fresh oatmeal cookies, Granolove Oatmeal Cookie Crunch is a delicious way to start the day, in camp or at home.

  • Ingredients: gluten-free oats*, sugars* (cane sugar*, maple syrup*), sunflower oil*, chia seeds*, pumpkin seeds*, gluten-free oat flour*, shredded coconut*, sunflower seeds*, puffed brown rice*, gum Arabic*, sea salt, cinnamon*, mixed tocopherols (added to preserve freshness). *Organic
  • Allergens: may contain: almonds, Brazil nuts, cashews, hazelnuts, pecans, pistachios, walnuts, sesame, soya
  • High in fibre, protein, and Omega-3s
  • Prana is Montreal based family business committed to making healthy and delicious snacks, with low impact. When possible, Prana Organics uses locally sourced organic ingredients. When they can’t find what they need nearby, Prana Organics ensure the farmers they work with use sustainable farming practices and have fair working environments
name: Prana Organic Granolove Oatmeal Cookie Crunch
